reviewText: My granddaughter really enjoyed this . All the little ballerinas,  just like her own ballet class on Saturday mornings. Perfect
My granddaughter plays it over and over. She knows all the songs and dances. It is a great video for her.
My 2 year old adores Angelina and her friends! These shows are short, sweet, and perfect watching for short attention spans!

My little is completely in love with Angelina and friends!  She is learning the great dancing moves from that Angelina and friends master.  She is also learning friendship, relationship with parents and siblings, helping each other and much much more.  It's a great story that I'd buy the completely series.  Keep up the great work!

I think Angelina is totally to blame, in a good way, for the fact that AppleBlossom loves to twirl and dance and asks to be a ballerina. These episodes are full of friendship and music history, like the disco. Learning about confidence is so a great a powerful lesson and these mouse friends really cover it. Then again, perfect timing on birthday wishes for this little girl. Love it!

My apologies that this review was drafted and never posted, but never fear, this film is timeless and your ballerina will love it now just as when it was released in the summer!

*Thanks to the publicist for providing a copy for review.*

This New DVD is Highly Recommended! A Great Story about Confidence,Taking One Step at a Time, A Great Story about a Modern Dance and Surprising a Special Friend on his Birthday. These Amazing Stories teach Great Lessons about Friendship and Confidence and More! Even A Great Story about Remembering to give a Helping Hand. A Dvd with Great Stories that you want to see again and again!

I live in a house full of women, and they love Angelina. Some of this may be because they love dancing, but I think they also just love the story of Angelina. As a father these episodes as well as the character of Angelina are wonderful as the messages that she shares are definitely ones that I want my girls to learn. This DVD has a great mix of different episodes that you can choose from and my girls really enjoyed the bonus feature on this DVD too! Altogether I have to give this DVD two thumbs up, not only for content, but also for entertainment value, as my girls wanted to watch these episodes over and over and my guess is that yours will too!
My little princess who just opens her sense of dancing, 3years old girl is enjoying every morning.

"Let's just set up a princess/ballerina roll model for little girls that is super bossy and doesn't listen. All the little girls will love to be just like her!" - This is not the kind of entertainment you want your impressionable little girls to be imitating.
loved it
We are Angelina fans! The dvd arrived quickly and it's a great episode. I've noticed thought that it sometimes jams up on us no matter what tv it plays on.
Great show!
Very cute video, my Grand daughter loved watching it
My granddaughter  loved it
The children loved this sweet video.

My daughter loves this show! She dances around all the time and tells me to call her Angelina and she actually learning ballet lingo . We've decided to sign her up for dance now, because of this show!
My grandkids have enjoyed every episode they've watched!!
Great movie
My 5 year old granddaughter loves the Angelina movies.
my grand daughter loves Angelina Ballerina all of them

Very used DVD cover and the DVD itself was broken (and doesn't stay clicked in the case).
I have no problem with the cover, but the broken DVD was disappointing.
My daughter loves it! Watching it over and over and over.....
My daughter loves this show. We have to watch them too often for my taste and patience but it keeps her happy.
We loved the movie  these are especially great for young girls like my Grandaughter.  Good moral and social guidance we watch one every night before bed

I watched Angelina Ballerina with my Granddaughter who is only 18 months.  She loved it.  She danced with them when they danced.  The stories really kept her interest.  I hope to find more Angelina Ballerina videos.
My daughters favorite show (I even enjoy)! I enjoy the lessons on music and dance while she teaches valuable life lessons.
My grand daughter can't get enough of Angelina Ballerina shows. Loves every episode! Watches over and over and over again.
My 4 & 6 year olds were entertained for about 15 minutes.
Cute show
My daughter 2yr old  is a fan of this show and I feel it is a nice change from many of the cartoons that have sarcastic and debating characters
My daughter love the Angelina ballerina moves. She just can't get enough.
Cute show, our daughter loves it. Safe for the little ones to watch.
My 2 year old daughter loves this show.  She mimics the dance movies,  it's so cute!
For road trip entertain of 3yr old girl -- perfection :)
Good.
